Package repository.base

Class CsvFileManager

java.lang.Object
repository.base.CsvFileManager
public class CsvFileManager extends Object
A class to manage CSV file operations such as creating files, reading lines, writing lines, appending lines, and finding records by column value.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Russell Arvin

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    CsvFileManager(String filePath, String header)
    Constructs a CsvFileManager for a given file path and header.

    Method
    Description
    void
    appendLine(String line)
    Appends a new line to the CSV file, ensuring proper newline formatting.
    void
    createFileIfNotExists()
    Creates the CSV file if it does not exist and writes the header row.
    void
    deleteLine(String id)
    Deletes the line with the given ID from the CSV file.

    findLineByColumnValue(String columnName, String searchValue)
    Finds and returns the first line in the CSV file where the specified column matches the given search value.

    • CsvFileManager

      public CsvFileManager(String filePath, String header)
      Constructs a CsvFileManager for a given file path and header.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the file path of the CSV file
      header - the header row for the CSV file

  • Method Details

    • getHeader

      public String getHeader()
      Returns the header of the CSV file.
      Returns:
      the header of the CSV file

    • createFileIfNotExists

      public void createFileIfNotExists()
      Creates the CSV file if it does not exist and writes the header row.

    • getLastLine

      public String getLastLine()
      Reads the last line from the CSV file, excluding the header.
      Returns:
      the last data line in the CSV file

    • readLine

      public String readLine(String searchId)
      Reads a line from the CSV file matching the given search ID.
      Parameters:
      searchId - the ID to search for in the first column
      Returns:
      the line that matches the search ID, or null if not found

    • appendLine

      public void appendLine(String line)
      Appends a new line to the CSV file, ensuring proper newline formatting.
      Parameters:
      line - the line to append

    • readAllLines

      public List<String> readAllLines()
      Reads all lines from the CSV file, excluding the header, and returns them as a list.
      Returns:
      a list of all data lines in the CSV file

    • writeAllLines

      public void writeAllLines(List<String> lines)
      Writes a list of lines to the CSV file, overwriting any existing content.
      Parameters:
      lines - the list of lines to write to the CSV file

    • writeLine

      public void writeLine(String line)
      Writes a single line to the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      line - the line to write to the CSV file

    • findLinesByColumnValue

      public List<String> findLinesByColumnValue(String columnName, String searchValue)
      Finds and returns all lines in the CSV file where the specified column matches the given search value.
      Parameters:
      columnName - the column to search by
      searchValue - the value to search for in the specified column
      Returns:
      a list of lines where the column value matches the search value
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the column name or search value is invalid

    • findLineByColumnValue

      public String findLineByColumnValue(String columnName, String searchValue)
      Finds and returns the first line in the CSV file where the specified column matches the given search value.
      Parameters:
      columnName - the column to search by
      searchValue - the value to search for in the specified column
      Returns:
      the first matching line, or null if not found
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the column name is invalid

    • deleteLine

      public void deleteLine(String id)
      Deletes the line with the given ID from the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the line to delete
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if no record with the given ID is found
